title: Dr. Horrible's Sing-Along Blog-720p(subs Eng-Spa)[by Kirune]
description:
This is an enhanced version, with better timing, subtitles in both languages and all that jazz.

Dr Horrible Sing-Alon Blog. 720p with subtitles in english and spanish(spain). I muxed that because all the subtitles I've found where a bit wrong. Once I improved them I decided to piece everything together to better share it with my friends. Then I realized that better to share with the whole community. So here it goes.

To better enjoy the subtitles (mostly in the last song in Chapter I and the first one in Chapter II) use a media player that take advantage of the ssa stylized subtitles. (i.e. 'media player classic' keeps the text in the designed position, VLC doesn't).

If anyone would like to do a karaoke version just contact me and I'll gladly send them the subtitles

Thank to the creators of the stuff I worked from.

Enjoy it and spread the joy of sharing.

peace.... but not literally XDDDD
